extendedInfo.description: The global network for meeting new people nearby who are ready to chat and meet â FREE! Anonymously finds other people nearby who like you. If you also like them, we make the connection and you can then chat for free and even send disappearing photos! Meet new people without getting spammed by people you aren't interested in meeting or chatting with. The largest and best FREE app to meet new people and make new friends for flirting, dating, chatting, friendship and fun!â¨The magic is in the simplicity...Go to the right to "like" the person, or to the left to " pass "If there is a mutual match, you can chat safely with each other within the app.Have fun and find out who likes you nearby!*** #1 social networking application for Meeting New People in the US ***

reviews.title: Freezing
reviews.comment: It keeps freezing while searching for matches and it affects my whole phone so I have to close the app. Fix this.
reviews.author: Jordan Williams

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Like the others have been saying, since the update, I\'ve been getting notifications but the app won\'t load. It\'s currently useless.
reviews.author: Jeni Castro

reviews.title: The app is 25 percent completed, useless
reviews.comment: Dont know where 2 begin. Just too many bugs. Needs a major overhaul
reviews.author: Kevin Conzett

reviews.title: Overall good however
reviews.comment: Love the application however when it comes to the matching part it never put it on so I never get to know who the person is.
reviews.author: Marcos Tincher

reviews.title: Long way to go...
reviews.comment: Soooo many glitches and bugs constantly being signed out and getting an error message. Not getting notifications.  Message saying I got a match comes up everytime I sign in. Will tell me no one in area then suddenly 50+ people in area without changing search settings
reviews.author: Dan Jewell

reviews.title: Really, really buggy.
reviews.comment: This app is somehow more buggy than tinder. Error 401 constantly and notifies you for old matches all the time. Needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: Bert Naggar

reviews.title: A lot of crashes
reviews.comment: It keep on logging out and needs to sign back in to fb
reviews.author: lee syaoran

reviews.title: Buggy and irrelevant
reviews.comment: Show people that are obviously from different parts of the world. I would rather know that nobody around me uses the app than to be falsely led to believe otherwise.  Also, looks ugly and has lot bugs and connection problems. Stick to tinder, it is much better
reviews.author: J\303\241n Kosa

reviews.title: It\'s Great!!
reviews.comment: App loads, and operates very smoothly! I would like to see button icons included in the user menu, just to make the separate options stand out a bit more (much like in the Tinder app.), if it\'s possible.  Otherwise the application works like a charm (aside from the occasional error 401), but that can be overlooked.   Great App!! :)
reviews.author: Justin Wright

reviews.title: Started off good, but down hill from there
reviews.comment: To many shut downs and too many problems with this app. Problems with my pictures, problems with searches and problems with wing persons pictures.
reviews.author: Lacy Oloyede

reviews.comment: Error 401 every 2 minutes!!! Very annoying.  Fix crashes and make it a bit more interactice and this app is great.  I still like the idea.  Fi x problems ill rate higher than 3
reviews.author: Rain Lobo

reviews.comment: It would be nice to be able to pick a photo from gallery
reviews.author: Andrew Minogue

reviews.comment: Really horrible app keeps logging me out every few mins
reviews.author: Purvi-Sonia Dave

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I keep getting error 401 and notifications of matches but won\'t load them
reviews.author: xtonkaman

reviews.title: Smh
reviews.comment: Ever since the update , it hasn\'t worked. I get notifications about matches but I can\'t even get passed the home screen. Please fix
reviews.author: Rodney Carroll

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Been using for about a month and I like it.  Just updated today and it quit working, though.  Also, whenevet that game came up with saying \"1 of the next 10 like you\" I never really did anything.  I also use Tinder and that one seems to be doing way better so far.
reviews.author: Daniel Klevmoen

reviews.title: Useless now
reviews.comment: Update doesn\'t work. Freezes upon open and during the last update, when I tried to upload a new picture from Facebook, it would only give me an error message.
reviews.author: Cory Montreuil

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: it skips messages, the distance is all messed up.
reviews.author: Michael Weston

reviews.title: Pics won\'t load
reviews.comment: Pics won\'t load. I also keep getting a notification saying that someone liked my profile but I can\'t see any pics so I can\'t say yes or no to any one... Pointless with out the pics
reviews.author: daniel price

reviews.title: Avg
reviews.comment: Glitches and says I have matches but when I click on the notification it says there is no one available
reviews.author: Tyrus White
